languages.text: "Так... говорит Великий Регент". {n}Кассия старается не встречаться с вами взглядом.{/n} "Ничего еще не решено. Некоторых в Доме окутывает непроглядная серая туча при мысли о том, что я стану {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}новатором{/g}. Но еще больших опутывают свинцово-сизые оковы. Они считают, что я не готова к подобной ноше".

traits.locale_text: "Так... говорит Великий Регент". {n}Кассия старается не встречаться с вами взглядом.{/n} "Ничего еще не решено. Некоторых в Доме окутывает непроглядная серая туча при мысли о том, что я стану новатором. Но еще больших опутывают свинцово-сизые оковы. Они считают, что я не готова к подобной ноше".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "So... says Regent Aaronto." {n}Cassia avoids meeting your eyes.{/n} "Nothing is decided yet. Some people in the House become enshrouded in rolling grey clouds at the thought of me becoming the {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}. But even more are bound with dull leaden chains. They think I am not ready for such a burden."
languages.original_text: "Так... говорит Великий Регент". {n}Кассия старается не встречаться с вами взглядом.{/n} "Ничего еще не решено. Некоторых в Доме окутывает непроглядная серая туча при мысли о том, что я стану {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}новатором{/g}. Но еще больших опутывают свинцово-сизые оковы. Они считают, что я не готова к подобной ноше".

traits.locale_text: "So... says regent Aaronto." {n}Cassia is avoiding your gaze.{/n} "Nothing is decided yet. Some people in the House become enshrouded in rolling grey clouds at the thought I may become the Novator. But even more are bound with dull leaden chains. They think I am not ready for such a burden."

They think I am not ready for such a burden."

Some people in the House become enshrouded in rolling grey clouds at the thought of me becoming the Novator. But even more are bound with dull leaden chains. Some people in the House become enshrouded in rolling grey clouds at the thought of me becoming the Novator. But even more are bound with dull leaden chains. traits.locale_text: "So... says Regent Aaronto." {n}Cassia avoids meeting your eyes.{/n} "Nothing is decided yet. Some people in the House become enshrouded in rolling grey clouds at the thought of me becoming the {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}. But even more are bound with dull leaden chains. They think I am not ready for such a burden."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “阿伦托摄政王……也是这么说的。”{n}卡西娅避开了你的视线。{/n}“现在一切都没有定论。家族中部分成员一想到我即将成为{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}大族长{/g}，身边就涌起了翻滚的灰云。但更多的人则被沉闷的铅色锁链束缚着，他们认为我并没有准备好承担这样的重任。”
languages.original_text: "So... says Regent Aaronto." {n}Cassia avoids meeting your eyes.{/n} "Nothing is decided yet. Some people in the House become enshrouded in rolling grey clouds at the thought of me becoming the {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}. But even more are bound with dull leaden chains. They think I am not ready for such a burden."

traits.locale_text: “阿伦托摄政王……也是这么说的。”{n}卡西娅避开了你的视线。{/n}“现在一切都没有定论。家族中部分成员一想到我即将成为{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}大族长{/g}，身边就涌起了翻滚的灰云。但更多的人则被沉闷的铅色锁链束缚着，他们认为我并没有准备好承担这样的重任。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "So... says Regent Aaronto." {n}Cassia avoids meeting your eyes.{/n} "Nothing is decided yet. Some people in the House become enshrouded in rolling grey clouds at the thought of me becoming the Novator. But even more are bound with dull leaden chains. They think I am not ready for such a burden."

languages.text: «Eso... dice el regente Aaronto». {n}Cassia evita mirarte a los ojos.{/n} «Todavía no hay nada en firme. Algunos miembros de la casa acaban envueltos en nubarrones grises al pensar que puedo ser la {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}. Y son más los que quedan atados por apagadas cadenas plomizas. Creen que no estoy lista para semejante carga».
languages.original_text: "So... says Regent Aaronto." {n}Cassia avoids meeting your eyes.{/n} "Nothing is decided yet. Some people in the House become enshrouded in rolling grey clouds at the thought of me becoming the {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}. But even more are bound with dull leaden chains. They think I am not ready for such a burden."

traits.locale_text: «Eso... dice el regente Aaronto». {n}Cassia evita mirarte a los ojos.{/n} «Todavía no hay nada en firme. Algunos miembros de la casa acaban envueltos en nubarrones grises al pensar que puedo ser la {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}. Y son más los que quedan atados por apagadas cadenas plomizas. Creen que no estoy lista para semejante carga».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「そのように…リージェント・アーロントはおっしゃっています」{n}カシアは目を合わせない。 {/n}「まだ何も決まっていません。私が{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}ノベイター{/g}になることで、家の何人かは灰色の雲に包まれるでしょう。ですが、さらに多くの人々は鈍い鉛の鎖で縛られることになります。彼らは私がそのような重荷を背負う準備ができていないと考えているのです」
languages.original_text: "So... says Regent Aaronto." {n}Cassia avoids meeting your eyes.{/n} "Nothing is decided yet. Some people in the House become enshrouded in rolling grey clouds at the thought of me becoming the {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}. But even more are bound with dull leaden chains. They think I am not ready for such a burden."

traits.locale_text: 「そのように…リージェント・アーロントはおっしゃっています」{n}カシアは目を合わせない。 {/n}「まだ何も決まっていません。私が{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}ノベイター{/g}になることで、家の何人かは灰色の雲に包まれるでしょう。ですが、さらに多くの人々は鈍い鉛の鎖で縛られることになります。彼らは私がそのような重荷を背負う準備ができていないと考えているのです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Das ... sagt Regent Aaronto." {n}Cassia weicht deinem Blick aus.{/n} "Noch ist nichts entschieden. Einige im Haus wurden bei dem Gedanken, ich könnte {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novatorin{/g} werden, von zornigen grauen Wolken umhüllt. Noch mehr jedoch sind von matten Bleiketten gefesselt. Sie glauben, ich sei nicht bereit für eine solche Last."
languages.original_text: "So... says Regent Aaronto." {n}Cassia avoids meeting your eyes.{/n} "Nothing is decided yet. Some people in the House become enshrouded in rolling grey clouds at the thought of me becoming the {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}. But even more are bound with dull leaden chains. They think I am not ready for such a burden."

traits.locale_text: "Das ... sagt Regent Aaronto." {n}Cassia weicht deinem Blick aus.{/n} "Noch ist nichts entschieden. Einige im Haus wurden bei dem Gedanken, ich könnte {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novatorin{/g} werden, von zornigen grauen Wolken umhüllt. Noch mehr jedoch sind von matten Bleiketten gefesselt. Sie glauben, ich sei nicht bereit für eine solche Last."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia évite soigneusement de vous regarder dans les yeux.{/n} « C'est... ce que dit Aaronto, mais rien n'est encore décidé. À la simple idée que je puisse devenir {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}, certains des membres de ma maison se retrouvent entourés de nuages gris menaçants, tandis que d'autres, plus nombreux encore, se retrouvent bardés de lourdes chaînes ternes. Ils ne me croient pas prête à assumer une telle responsabilité. »
languages.original_text: "So... says Regent Aaronto." {n}Cassia avoids meeting your eyes.{/n} "Nothing is decided yet. Some people in the House become enshrouded in rolling grey clouds at the thought of me becoming the {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}. But even more are bound with dull leaden chains. They think I am not ready for such a burden."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia évite soigneusement de vous regarder dans les yeux.{/n} « C'est... ce que dit Aaronto, mais rien n'est encore décidé. À la simple idée que je puisse devenir {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}, certains des membres de ma maison se retrouvent entourés de nuages gris menaçants, tandis que d'autres, plus nombreux encore, se retrouvent bardés de lourdes chaînes ternes. Ils ne me croient pas prête à assumer une telle responsabilité. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Naip Aaronto da öyle diyor." {n}Cassia seninle göz temasından sakınıyor.{/n} "Henüz hiçbir şey kesinleşmedi. {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Rota Reisi{/g} olma ihtimalimi düşününce bile Hanemdeki bazı insanların çevresini kabaran gri bulutlar kaplıyor. Mat kurşuni zincirlere sarılmış olanlarsa onlardan da kalabalık. Böylesine bir yükü sırtlanmaya hazır olmadığımı düşünüyorlar."
languages.original_text: "So... says Regent Aaronto." {n}Cassia avoids meeting your eyes.{/n} "Nothing is decided yet. Some people in the House become enshrouded in rolling grey clouds at the thought of me becoming the {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}. But even more are bound with dull leaden chains. They think I am not ready for such a burden."

traits.locale_text: "Naip Aaronto da öyle diyor." {n}Cassia seninle göz temasından sakınıyor.{/n} "Henüz hiçbir şey kesinleşmedi. {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Rota Reisi{/g} olma ihtimalimi düşününce bile Hanemdeki insanlardan bazılarının suratı beş karış asılıyor. Kimileriyse işi yokuşa sürüyor. Böylesine ağır bir yükü sırtlanmaya hazır olmadığımı düşünüyorlar."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
